evidence: We developed a classifier to distinguish temporal/atemporal entities and our proposed method outperforms the state-of-the-art approach by 6.1 percent .
text: We developed a classifier to distinguish temporal/atemporal entities and our proposed method outperforms the state-of-the-art approach by 6.1 percent .

evidence: This paper studies named entity translation and proposes `` selective temporality '' as a new feature , as using temporal features may be harmful for translating `` atemporal '' entities .
text: This paper studies named entity translation and proposes `` selective temporality '' as a new feature , as using temporal features may be harmful for translating `` atemporal '' entities .
